name: isolator
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a switch or control that completely stops the flow of something such as electricity or water to a particular place: The power company fitted a mains isolator. I turned the water off at the isolator. Appliances such as cookers should have an isolator switch.
engineering
  specialized a device that protects something from being affected by vibrations (= shaking movements): The base of a sculpture can be fitted with an isolator that protects the piece from shaking if there is an earthquake. You can mount a vibration isolator on the legs of your bed to dampen the vibrations caused by machinery in the building.
science
  specialized a device used, for example in a laboratory (= a place where scientific experiments are done), to keep a process separate from the environment around it: When working with mice in an isolator they may be picked up using a pair of large forceps with rubber covers on their tips.
